short_description: english hazel hurdles is a building material manufacturer based in cranleigh, united kingdom.
long_description: hazel hurdles are a traditional and very popular and attractive alternative to garden panels or garden screens and wind breaks. our hazel is sourced from local surrey and sussex woodlands managed sustainably on a long term basis. supporting posts are built-into the continuous weave and are not clearly visible.
business_tags: woodland management | vegetable gardens | lawn edging | oil tanks
generated_description: english hurdles is a company based in cranleigh, england, specializing in the production of traditional hazel hurdles. the company offers premium wattle hazel hurdle panels made from a mixture of cleft and round hazel sourced from local surrey and sussex woodlands managed sustainably. their products include garden screens, windbreaks, and edging hurdles woven from natural english hazel. english hurdles also provides bespoke continuous weave hurdles, which are built in-situ to follow curving lines or undulating ground. the company is known for its high-quality craftsmanship and commitment to sustainability.
